nodes.bodyText: Hmm - actually I don't see this in the semantic conventions, I see examples like /webshop/articles/:article_id. Do we need to add a servlet semantic convention if we want to use class/method name for the server span name?
Though I mainly ask here just to make sure the method doesn't appear in the span name at some point :) But I guess either way it wouldn't.

This comment was just moved, not new in this PR.
I'm glad you feel that way though, see latest commits in #1418 😄
